summary: Harry Munter, a sensitive, kind, appealing man in his twenties, lives with his parents. He's an inventor, a bit of a mystic, maybe a genius, and a good son and grandson. He's offered work ... See full summary »
cast: Jan Nielsen|Carl-Gustaf Lindstedt|Gun Jönsson|Georg Adelly|Alan Simon|Elina Salo|Märta Allan-Johnson|Gerda Calander|Inga Dahlbeck|Britt Marie Engstroem|Marie-Louise Mark|Palle Westerlund
title: Harry Munter
